meanings.sent1: The animaliers at the zoo created lifelike sculptures of the animals.
meanings.sent2: The talented animaliers sculpted a beautiful lion out of clay.
meanings.sent3: The animaliers decided to sculpt a giant giraffe out of ice for the winter festival.
meanings.sent4: The animaliers' sculptures were so realistic, they seemed to come to life.
meanings.sent5: Visiting the workshop of the animaliers was like stepping into a zoo made of clay and stone.

meanings.definition: A group of artists who specialize in creating sculptures of animals.
meanings.sent1: The animaliers gathered at the art gallery to showcase their latest creations.
meanings.sent2: The animaliers' exhibit featured a stunning collection of animal sculptures.
meanings.sent3: The animaliers' studio was filled with the sounds of chisels and hammers as they worked on their sculptures.
meanings.sent4: The animaliers' sculptures captured the essence of each animal in a unique way.
meanings.sent5: Walking through the exhibit, it felt as though the animaliers had brought the zoo indoors.
